Detailed Description

Obsolete - all sound classes from AddOns/MultiMedia have been replaced by a new audio concept. Use the AudioDeviceManager instead for playing sounds.

Member Function Documentation

AtomItem * SoundItem::Clone (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a pointer to a flat copy of this object, hence the cloned object and the original object are pointing to the same sound.

See also:
